title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 49 - Fraternal Benefit Societies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 49 - Fraternal Benefit Societies

State Regulations
§ 49.1 - Accident and health certificates
§ 49.2 - Total and permanent disability benefits
§ 49.3 - Annuity certificates
§ 49.4 - Separability provisions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 49

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 3201, 3215, 3216, 3219, 4501, 4504, 4505, 4512, 4513

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
